title: Bug 18028 - Rename package doesn't check if all resources are writeable
description: Bug 18028 - Rename package doesn't check if all resources are writeable
OB: When trying to rename a package, the system does not check if all resources (files) inside the package are writeable.
EB: The software should perform a precondition check to ensure that all resources (files) inside the package are writeable before attempting to rename the package.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the software and navigate to the package renaming feature. 
2. Choose a package that contains one or more read-only files. 
3. Attempt to rename the package and observe the system behavior.
